properties.areaDesc: Joshua Tree NP East; Chuckwalla Valley; Chiriaco Summit; Chuckwalla Mountains
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 2 at 2:20AM MST until February 3 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix AZ
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Eastern portion of Joshua Tree National Park,
Chuckwalla Mountains, and Chiriaco Summit.

* WHEN...From 1 AM to 4 PM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger
vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light,
unsecured objects may become airborne.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between
30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and
58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially
for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert
areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under
a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra
caution.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM PST MONDAY
